BELLE OF THE HOTEL
Or. American

Sketches.

A few of the sketches in this Monopolylo^ttB, are familiar to ;ill travellers in the United States. - - I h e American F i r e m a n ,
with his political s o n g s — t h e Irish Chambermaid, w h o is to lie found in almost every Trnnsntlanlic Hotel—and t h e O l d
Lady Tourist, t a k i n g note* from very doubtful authority, are common to t h e most cureless observer. T h e remaining
c h a r a c t e r s , t h o u g h fancy outlines, d o n o t violate a n y probability in their supposed a p p e a r a n c e in thnt rendezvous for
persons of all nations—North America.
